oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Southern Flag newspaper
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Southern Flag newspaper was published in Lawrenceburg, Tennessee in 1861. This edition discusses the early phase of the war. Repeated in the paper is a speech by Howell Cobb of Georgia about non-intercourse with the North. Also printed in the paper is the current exchange rates and solvency of banks in Tennessee and in a few other Southern states.
